relevant_communication: We drafted an Alternative White Paper on citizens' rights as well as numerous related papers on the EU-UK negotiations and have spoken at various events in the European Parliament, including two hearings on citizens' rights: in May 2017 and February 2018.  Please see here: https://britishineurope.org/category/bie-publications/
goals__remit: We are a coalition of UK citizens groups with members in countries across the EU. We number around 35,000 members. We aim to secure and maintain our full bundle of EU rights after Brexit.
